analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LendContract.finish (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#700-721):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#701-704)
	- MintableToken(token).mint(_reserveFund,tokensForReserve) (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#715-719)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleStarted (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#720)
_stage in LendContract.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#621) is a local variable never initialiazed

LendContract.finish (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#700-721) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).mint(_reserveFund,tokensForReserve) (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#715-719)

Reentrancy in LendContract.finish (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#700-721):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#701-704)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensForReserve (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#712-714)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#285-293) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#289-291)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#299-306) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_contracts/0x294adfa61038c0e1e968507d7ada6be5e6562629.sol#303-306)
